sentences.english: Embracing warm blood, I sing of youth without regret. Look upon the horizon and know not when my ally would return.
sentences.chinese: 满腔热血唱出青春无悔，望穿天涯不知战友何时回。

sentences.english: Many of Jones' old friends join his team, along with some new ones.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯的许多老战友和一些新朋友都会加入他的阵容。

sentences.english: You want to win and comrade-in-arms with the crown the god of war you?
sentences.chinese: 你想和战友一起摘取战地之神的桂冠吗？

sentences.english: With legs slightly down, raising his glass to his chest.
sentences.chinese: 说着双腿微跪，酒杯举到战友胸前。
迷人的索菲亚是我的战友。

sentences.english: The soldier didn't desert his comrade-in-arms so as to sav his own life.
sentences.chinese: 这个士兵没有为了保全自己的性命而不顾战友。

sentences.english: This book I inscribe to my old comrades-in-arms.
sentences.chinese: 谨将本书献给我的老战友们。

sentences.english: Comrade, I wish you bon voyage, be careful in the midnight cold north wind.
sentences.chinese: 战友，祝你一路平安，当心夜半北风寒。

sentences.english: The sight of the old comrade-in-arms carried me back to my days in the army .
sentences.chinese: 见到老战友使我回想起自己在部队中的日子。

sentences.english: I think what he missed is brotherhood.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他想念的是战友情。

sentences.english: Never share a foxhole with anyone braver than yourimmolation.
sentences.chinese: 永远别跟比你勇敢的战友呆在同一个散兵坑里。

sentences.english: I thought the soldiers in my airborne unit would think I was broken.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得空降师中的战友会认为我已濒临崩溃。

sentences.english: Frozen German casualties were removed from their foxholes and Allied troops moved in.
sentences.chinese: 冻僵的德国伤员被抬出散兵坑，他们的战友再挪进去。

sentences.english: Mr Meridor's father was a comrade-in-arms of the party's founder.
sentences.chinese: 梅里多先生的父亲是该党创始人的战友。

sentences.english: He hungered for letters from his old comrades-in-arms.
sentences.chinese: 他渴望得到老战友的来信。

definition: to be discharged from military service
